subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ernie Els, a former No. 1 player in the world, shot a two-under-par 70 in the first round of the CA Championship on Thursday to trail the leaders by three shots.
snippet: Ernie Els, a former No. 1 player in the world, shot a two-under-par 70 in the first round of the CA Championship on Thursday to trail the leaders by three shots.
